channel.title: How do I do this? (No this is not a stupid noob question nor is it answered)

item.title: How do I do this? (No this is not a stupid noob question nor is it answered)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

He isn’t trying to change NPCs. He’s trying to replace an NPC loaded from autospawn.cfg into another one when it gets attacked. Of course, the autospawn works something like a while statement I’d imagine. While the NPC is on autospawn.cfg, it appears in game… So you can’t really replace it like that.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I do this? (No this is not a stupid noob question nor is it answered)
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

I have a man (ID 1024)
I need to make it if you attack him he turns into wolfman (ID 1030)
I put code in that compiled right but it didnt work maybe i put it at wrong place…?
it was something like this
if (NPCID == 1024 && server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].IsUnderAttack == true) {
NPCID = 1030;
updateRequired = true;
appearenceUpdateRequired = true;
}
that might not be my accual code, (its something like it, ya know typos happen)

Read full topic
